languages.text: "В произошедшем на станции не могут быть повинны лишь слуги — большинство трупов, что я встречал{mf||а}, немощны или безоружны".

traits.locale_text: "В произошедшем на станции не могут быть повинны лишь слуги — большинство трупов, что я встречал{mf||а}, немощны или безоружны".

languages.text: "The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."
languages.original_text: "В произошедшем на станции не могут быть повинны лишь слуги — большинство трупов, что я встречал{mf||а}, немощны или безоружны".

traits.locale_text: "The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened at the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."
"The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened at the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."
"The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened at the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."
"The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened at the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."
"The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."
"The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."

languages.text: «No es correcto culpar solo a los sirvientes por lo que ocurrió en la estación. La mayoría de los cadáveres que encontré iban desarmados o parecían débiles».
languages.original_text: "The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."

traits.locale_text: «No es correcto culpar solo a los sirvientes por lo que ocurrió en la estación. La mayoría de los cadáveres que encontré iban desarmados o parecían débiles».

languages.text: "Man kann nicht den Dienern allein die Schuld für die Geschehnisse auf der Station geben. Die meisten Leichen, die ich entdeckt habe, waren entweder unbewaffnet oder schwach."
languages.original_text: "The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."

traits.locale_text: "Man kann nicht den Dienern allein die Schuld für die Geschehnisse auf der Station geben. Die meisten Leichen, die ich entdeckt habe, waren entweder unbewaffnet oder schwach."

languages.text: « Vous ne pouvez pas rejeter la faute de ce qui est arrivé à la station uniquement sur les serviteurs. La plupart des corps que j'ai découverts étaient soit désarmés, soit affaiblis. »
languages.original_text: "The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne pouvez pas rejeter la faute de ce qui est arrivé à la station uniquement sur les serviteurs. La plupart des corps que j'ai découverts étaient soit désarmés, soit affaiblis. »

languages.text: “这座星站发生的事情不能全都怪在那些仆人身上。我发现的绝大多数尸体不是手无寸铁，就是孱弱不堪。”
languages.original_text: "The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."

traits.locale_text: “这座星站发生的事情不能全都怪在那些仆人身上。我发现的绝大多数尸体不是手无寸铁，就是孱弱不堪。”

languages.text: 「ステーションで起きたことについて、従者だけが悪いわけではない。見つけた死体は、丸腰か衰弱していたものがほとんどだった」
languages.original_text: "The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションで起きたことについて、責める対象は従者だけじゃない。見つけた死体は、丸腰か衰弱していたものがほとんどだった」
「ステーションで起きたことについて、従者だけが悪いわけではない。見つけた死体は、丸腰か衰弱していたものがほとんどだった」

languages.text: "İstasyona olanların hepsini hizmetkârlardan bilmemek lazım. Bulduğum cesetlerin çoğu ya silahsız ya da çelimsizdi."
languages.original_text: "The servants alone cannot be blamed for what happened on the station. Most corpses I discovered were either unarmed or feeble."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyona olanların hepsini hizmetkârlardan bilmemek lazım. Bulduğum cesetlerin çoğu ya silahsız ya da çelimsizdi."
